name: Wool PLAID Pencil Skirt
description:
♡ Perfect work skirt! Pair with button down and jacket for work, and cropped knit top for a date. It is very comfortable to move around due to the back vent, yet the knee length and the high waisted style make it so flattering! 

♡ pencil, I-line skirt
♡ high waisted (waist band sits on actual waist)
♡ vent in the skirt back for easy walking
♡ fully lined
♡ lining is white polyester 
♡ fabric NOT pre-washed 
♡ dry clean only
♡ invisible zipper and hook and eye closure in center back of the skirt
♡ wool 100%

❤ SIZE:
.........................................................
♡ S
♡ These are the garment measurements taken flat. Please make sure to leave some breathing room. For made to order skirt, please send me a message
Length: 25(64cm)
Waist: 26" (66cm)
Hip: 42"(106cm)

❤ EXTRA BITS YOU MIGHT LIKE TO KNOW:
.................................................................................
♡ This is one-of-a-kind. Once it’s gone, it’s gone!
♡ The item will be shipped within 1-2 business days upon purchase. 
♡ Colors may vary slightly due to your monitor settings.

name: SAMPLE SALE - Bohemian HANDPAINTED Silk Lux Dress
description:
♡ This 100% silk dress feels soft and luxurious. What's more is that the floral print is hand-painted by me, and the dress is completely unique. The floral and grapes were painted using special silk paint, called seta-silk on a champagne color satin silk . 

♡ asymmetrical skirt hem 
♡ shorter in back, and longer in front (the model is 5' 5")
♡ slip style dress
♡ spaghetti straps, made of the same champagne color satin silk
♡ fully lined with white polyester lining fabric
♡ fabric is NOT pre-washed, and it is not washable. Please dry-clean .
♡ fashion fabric: light weight 100% satin silk in champagne color.
♡ invisible zipper closure in center back of the dress
♡ great for unconventional weddings, like garden weddings or bohemian-themed weddings! 

♡ This is a sample sale of the Vivat Veritas bohemian hand painted silk dress. Please note that the different price applies to a custom order. Please inquire for details. The floral motif can be customized to fit your preference. I'd love to work with you! 


❤ SIZE:
.........................................................
♡ Best fit for Small to Medium (ready-to-ship). Size is adjustable with back straps.
♡ These are the garment measurements taken flat. Please make sure to leave some breathing room. 
Front length (the longest part, taken from the bust triangle of the dress, not including the strap length: 34.5" (88cm)
Back length (the longest part, taken from the beginning of the center back zipper, not including the strap length: 24.5" (62cm)
Bust: 34.5"(88cm)
Waist: 33" (84cm)
♡ The straps start from the bust triangles, and go through the loops in the back to tie in the back. You can wear the straps in "x" way in the back or regular way.

❤ EXTRA BITS YOU MIGHT LIKE TO KNOW:
.................................................................................
♡ This is one-of-a-kind. Once it’s gone, it’s gone!
♡ The item will be shipped within 1-2 business days upon purchase. 
♡ Colors may vary slightly due to your monitor settings.

PLEASE NOTE THE POLICIES SECTION BEFORE PURCHASING. BY BUYING THIS ITEM, YOU AGREE TO ALL POLICIES IN THAT SECTION. http://vivatveritas.bigcartel.com/shop-policy

...............................................................................................
♡ Photographer: Yasunori Suzuki
♡ Model: Noemie Nakai

name: Kawasaki FACTORY City Midi Pencil Skirt
description:
♡ I found this unique night city view picture-print fabric here in Japan, and I could not resist showing it off by making a simple knee length pencil skirt. It reminds me of the city Kawasaki, where are lot of factories are. Wear it with a simple turtle neck knit or cropped top! 

♡ pencil, I-line skirt
♡ midi length. the skirt hits right below the knees (the model is 5' 5")
♡ high waisted (waist band sits on actual waist)
♡ vent in the skirt back for easy walking
♡ fully lined
♡ lining is white polyester 
♡ fabric pre-washed 
♡ fashion fabric: light weight 100% cotton, white side panel fabric: TC poplin (polyester and cotton blend)
♡ hand wash and line dry
♡ invisible zipper and hook and eye closure in center back of the skirt


❤ SIZE:
.........................................................
♡ XS (ready-to-ship)or Made to Order in your size
♡ These are the garment measurements taken flat. Please make sure to leave some breathing room. For made to order skirt, please send me a message
Length: 25" (63cm)
Waist: 25" (63cm)
Hip: 38.5"(98cm)

❤ EXTRA BITS YOU MIGHT LIKE TO KNOW:
.................................................................................

♡ XS is ready-to-ship. For other sizes, please contact me.
♡ The ready-to-ship item will be shipped within 1-2 business days upon purchase. For custom made, please allow 1-3 weeks of production. 
♡ Colors may vary slightly due to your monitor settings.

PLEASE NOTE THE POLICIES SECTION BEFORE PURCHASING. BY BUYING THIS ITEM, YOU AGREE TO ALL POLICIES IN THAT SECTION. http://vivatveritas.bigcartel.com/shop-policy

❤ PHOTO CREDIT:
...............................................................................................
♡ Photographer: Yasunori Suzuki
♡ Model: Noemie Nakai

❤ LITTLE BIT ABOUT MY DESIGN:
...............................................................................................

The process of making each clothes first starts with finding fabrics and designing. I draw inspirations from various blogs, pinterest, people around me and travel. I usually go to Nippori fabric district in Tokyo to find fabrics that inspire me to create new clothes. Some of the items listed in my shop is one-of-a-kind, using limited amount of fabrics I find at various shops. Some are made-to-order. If you see something you like but the size or color does not fit your need, please feel free to contact me to request a custom made item via Etsy’s conversation feature or email to vivatveritasshop [!at] gmail.com. Additional fee might apply to a custom made item. 
Every clothes is handmade by me, in my studio, in Tokyo, Japan. 

Please visit my blog for a behind the scenes look at my work and my studio space. www.vivatveritas.com

TWITTER: http://twitter.com/vivatveritas
FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Vivat-Veritas/156896737693815
PINTEREST: http://www.pinterest.com/vivatveritas/

❤ -Chie

name: Ahoy Sailor Dress
description:
Take this sailor dress to your Summer vacation! The dress is made out of crisp cotton blend fabric. It is simple yet catches attention with lovely cutout detail and a pop of orange. 

- neck cutout
- sweet heart neckline
- not lined but not sheer
- big orange button in front
- invisible zipper closure in center back
- navy blue and white pin stripes fabric
- orange piping details around waist bands
- fabric is cotton blend, pre-washed
- care: hand wash with cold water and hang dry 

Available in size XS. 
Other sizes are available upon request (custom order). Please note the same fabric may not be available. 

Size: XS
Garment measurements taken flat (Please leave some room for proper fit)
Length: 34" (86cm) 
Bust : 30" (76cm)
Waist: 26" (66cm)

All sales are final.

name: Vintage Inspired High Waisted Pleats Shorts, Black Romantic Floral - S
description:
Wear these vintage-inspired high waisted shorts with cropped top or button down with tie front! These shorts are super comfortable yet stylish. 

- high waist
- zipper and button closure in front
- mock pocket on right front side
- pleats details
- elastic back waist
- side pockets
- 100% cotton twill, pre-washed
- romantic vintage floral motif
- cuff hem

Size: S
Garment measurements taken flat (Please leave some room for proper fit)
Waist: 26-28" (66-71cm)
Hip 49" (124.5cm)
Length: 15.5" (39cm)
Inseam: 3.5" (9cm)

All sales are final.

Model: Reiko Motobu

name: Paris Eiffel Tower Slip Dress - S
description:
This one-of-a-kind slip dress in Eiffel tower print is great for hot summer for the town or beach! 

- V neckline
- Mini dress
- fully lined (lining material: 100% polyester, white)
- darts front and back
- invisible zipper closure in center back
- straps are adjustible, made out of navy blue grogain ribon
- unique Eiffel tower print with blue flower motif and black and white stripes
- fabric is light-weight polyester
- care: hand wash with cold water and hang dry 

Size: small
Garment measurements taken flat (Please leave some room for proper fit)
Length: 31.5" (80cm)
Bust : 34" (86cm)
Waist 30" (76cm)
Hip: 43" (109cm)

All sales are final.

Photo credit:
Photographer: Yasunori Suzuki
Model: Reiko Motobu

name: Chasing the Waterfall Dress
description: This dress was inspired by a wedding I attended in the woods. The place was full of natural beauty and was completely silent, save the sound of chirping birds. The color scheme of the wedding was green. This dress was made out of truly unique waterfall print I found here in Japan. The dress is I-line, features triangle cut outs in neckline, sleeveless and skirt with pleats in front and back. Please note that because how the fabric is printed, it might not be exactly as shown in the picture. Also, depending on your computer screen, the color may look different. Zipper closure in center back. The dress is fully lined. Made of 100% light weight cotton, pre-washed to avoid color fading. The lining is 100% polyester. Please select your size from the Size Chart. Dress length: 33" Please allow 1-2 weeks for production. Photographer: Yasunori Suzuki Model: Eleonore Leno Make up and hair: Naoko Ishibe

name: Ivory Bow Sash - For Wedding, Brides and Bridal Parties - Made to Order
description:
Adorable sash to tie around the waist. It goes well with Vivat Veritas cotton lace casual wedding dress! 

Fabric: Ivory color polyester satin and white tutu fabric
Closure in the back with snaps

Sash length: your waist size
Sash width: 2"
Bow width: 5"
Bow length: 2.5"

name: Retro Chic NYC Girls Fit & Flare Dress with Midriff Cutout
description: This dress was inspired by the fabric I bought during my NYC trip. The girls in pretty dresses reminds me of the illustrations on vintage pattern envelop. This fit & flare dress features black piping on seam lines and midriff cut out. Zipper closure in center back. The dress is not lined, but not sheer. Made of 100% cotton fabric in medium weight for top, cotton and poly mix for skirt. Please check theSize Chart. Photos by Alyssa Valcourt Model: Ryoco Motohashi

name: Around Town Top with Mesh Insert
description:
Perfect easy-to-wear top for Spring! 
Made of fun and unique print with houses and street. Black mesh insert in the middle area (10cm wide) adds some twist to a simple top. The top falls right below the hip with a little bit of peplum-like flare. Small cap sleeves which extend from shoulders.
Round neckline. 
The top part (until the lace insert) is lined with beige lining fabric.

Fabric is pre-washed, and is polyester. 
Care: machine wash with cold water in a washing net and lay flat or hang to dry. No dryer.

Size: Fits small to medium 
Garment measurements 
Bust: 42" (107cm) 
Length: 24" (61cm)

name: Feather Print Fit & Flare Dress with Midriff Cutout - Collaboration with Oslo and Alfred
description: This dress was made in collaboration to Taren S. Black of Oslo and Alfred. She is an illustrator based in Tokyo, Japan. I heard that she was designing print fabric, I could not resist asking her to collaborate with me. So, we turned one of her prints into a dress! This fit & flare dress features orange piping on seam lines (green piping for green leaf fabric), and midriff cut out. The dress can be made without a cutout, please contact us upon purchase. Zipper closure in center back. The dress is not lined, but not sheer. Made of 100% cotton fabric in medium weight. Please select your size from the Size Chart. Please allow 3-5 weeks for production if your size says "Made to Order".

- dropped waist dress
- cropped sleeves
- comfy
- ruffle at skirt hem
- made of polyester blend knit

name: Cotton Lace Casual Wedding Dress - Made to Order
description:
Perfect casual wedding dress for a garden wedding! This dress was made with cotton lace with floral motif, featuring cropped sleeves and swing half circle skirt

- long sleeves (3/4 length, cropped sleeves)
- round neckline
- fully lined
- structured upper body
- cinch at waist
- half circle skirt
- above the knee length skirt
- cotton lace, floral motif
- fabric is pre-washed
- fabric does not have stretch

Size: made to order
Please provide me with your bust, waist, hip measurements and desired length of the dress. It takes up to three weeks for production, but usually takes 1-2 weeks.

Please read my shop policy before purchasing.

name: Black Polk-a-dot Peplum Top with Neon Piping
description:
Adorable top, perfect for the summer!

- neon green piping detail

name: Romantic Pink Floral Headband
description:
Cute handmade headband for yourself or as a gift for special occasions! 

The headband goes all the way around the head. There is a wire inside the headband, so you can arrange the shape as you like. The wire also helps the headband to stay on your head without slipping off. 

The headband can be worn as a bunny ear, or you can twist the end behind your hair or by the side.

The headband goes all the way around the head. The back part is made of black elastic band, so the headbands fit around your head comfortably without slipping off. The headband is made in pretty pale pink chiffon with brown dot pattern. The fabric is layered in two. 

Great addition for bad hair day - you can just put your hair in pony tail or bun, and add this headband!
